content: With the Celestial Birthstone Fragment equipped your enemies' four elemental Bane resistances will be completely ignored, allowing you to deal maximum damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Birthstone_Fragment.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Birthstone Fragment'.
The content is as follows:
With the Celestial Birthstone Fragment equipped your enemies' four elemental Bane resistances will be completely ignored, allowing you to deal maximum damage.
